start.speaker: Sableglass Cartographer
start.text:
Don’t trust dunes. They rearrange landmarks like a bored thief.

If you find a compass that spins only when you think of home—throw it away. It’s already owned you.

choices.text: Keep it and use it knowingly.

end.speaker: Narrator
end.text: You learn the first rule of sableglass: navigation is a negotiation.
